body.p: The IASB also decided to require a lessee to disclose the expense related to short-term leases for which the lessee has elected to apply the short-term lease exemption (see paragraph 53(c) of IFRS 16 and paragraph BC217(c)). In the IASB’s view, this disclosure provides useful information to users of financial statements about the lease payments that are excluded from lease liabilities as a consequence of the short-term lease exemption.
